DOC.brief_summary: Abdominal hypopressive technique ( AHT ) therapy create treatment pelvic floor dysfunction postpartum . In last year extend medical context lack scientific evidence , endurability effect technique unknown . The investigator´s aim evaluate effect 12 week AHT program 1 ) tone pelvic floor muscle 2 ) urinary incontinence , woman postpartum phase . In addition investigator look endurability effect . Methods : The investigator perform cross-over blind intervention study 4 month duration , woman , stratified age , randomly assign sequence AHT-no AHT AHT-AHT . The AHT program consist 30 minute session , 3 day per week 2 month . The investigator compare effect AHT versus AHT , AHT 2 month versus AHT . The endpoint difference perineal tonometry , urinary incontinence symptom , measure ICIQ_SF . Comparisons test student test , pair unpaired adequate .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Abdominal Hypopressive Technique Program Pelvic Floor Muscles Urinary Incontinence Women
DOC.criteria: systematic participation sport physical activity ( ≤ 3 session per week , ≤ 2 week per month ) 20 65 year old availability three afternoon per week . hypertension serious disease pregnancy postpartum phase 2 month delivery .
